title: Owning Bipolar: A Conversation with Michael Pipich - Part 2
itunes:title: Owning Bipolar: A Conversation with Michael Pipich - Part 2
description: This is part 2 of my interview with Michael Pipich, author of the book, Owning Bipolar. In this part of the interview Michael discusses his therapeutic approach to treating Bipolar Disorder. If you have been diagnosed with bipolar or know someone who has, this episode is for you. Michael Pipich brings his 30 years of experience together in his book, Owning Bipolar.
